Text: nej men ser man på, lilla objektivisten har lärt sig hantera torrents. Så gulligt.

George Reisman som håller föredraget 'Why Nazism Was Socialism and Why Socialism is Totalitarian' är den enda av föreläsarna som är objektivist (vad jag känner till). Och jag personligen är absolut ingen objektivist. 

Exakt vad som är gulligt med objektivister och torrents förstår jag dock inte.

If you find this interesting, the TV-series Free to Choose might interest you as well. "Free To Choose® began as an award winning PBS television series featuring Milton Friedman, Nobel Prize-winning economist. Free To Choose is about freedom, the interrelationship of personal, political and economic freedom."
http://thepiratebay.org/details.php?id=3369921
The Free To Choose series was quite good. Milton is good, except on the issue of money and inflation.
Whats the problem with Dr Friedman and money/inflation? Thought that was what he´s famous for! Link to some well written (and not too long!) critique of this?

Sorry for the delay, but here is a critique of the late Dr Friedman.

"Milton Friedman Unraveled"  
http://www.mises.org/journals/jls/16_4/16_4_3.pdf
